high_descs: Turn right and make your way to the left edge of the desk
Pick up the statue from the desk
Turn left and go to the wall
anns.task_desc: Examine the statue under the light near the desk

high_descs: Move to the right and stand at the end of the desk.
Pick the statue up from the desk.
Turn to the left and face the lamp on the top of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a statue and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: walk to face left side of desk
pick up human figurine statue from desk
turn left to face wall to left of desk
turn on lamp above the desk
